items.faq: What are your hours of operation?
items.answer: Our website is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Contact Centre support is available from Monday to Sunday, 08:00 am to 10:00 pm. Deliveries will be done for all orders made between 8.00 am to 8.00 pm every day of the week.

items.faq: How long do I have to wait to get my delivery?
items.answer: Your purchase will be delivered within 4 hours after if you make your order between 8:00 am and 8.00 p.m. for deliveries within Nairobi. Monday to Sunday. If you purchase after 8.00 p.m., delivery will be done by 10.00 am the next day.

items.faq: Do you accept any insurance plans?
items.answer: Yes, we accept health insurance plans. We have partnered with specific providers to ensure that you can easily pay for your medication on MYDAWA. Visit our prescription page to see the list of insurance companies that are already active. If your health insurer is not yet available, please talk to your Human Resource manager or your insurance agent about using your health cover on MYDAWA.

items.faq: Are medications available at MYDAWA.com secure?
items.answer: Yes. The medications that you purchase at our online store are of the highest quality. The prescription as well as over the counter medications we provide are procured from world-class and well-recognized pharmaceutical manufacturers. They are manufactured in facilities that comply to WHO-GMP (Good Manufacturing) Standards and packaged in factory-sealed blister packs

Deliveries within Nairobi and the Nairobi Metropolitan area are done free of charge. For orders outside Nairobi and upcountry orders, the charges will be displayed on the summary page before you make payment.

items.faq: What if I pay more than my final order value?
items.answer: Deliveries within Nairobi and the Nairobi Metropolitan area are done free of charge. For orders outside Nairobi and upcountry orders, the charges will be displayed on the summary page before you make payment.
